darkkore.optiontype.info.boolean: Click the button to toggle between on/off
darkkore.optiontype.info.list: Click the button to cycle between options
darkkore.optiontype.info.double: Type any number with or without decimals in here
darkkore.optiontype.info.doublerange: Type any number with or without decimals in here from %.2f to %.2f
darkkore.optiontype.info.integer: Type any whole number in here
darkkore.optiontype.info.integerrange: Type any whole number in here from %d to %d
darkkore.optiontype.info.hotkey: Click on the hotkey and type a combination
darkkore.optiontype.info.color: Type a hex color in the format #AARRGGBB here
darkkore.optiontype.info.extendedcolor: Type a hex color in the format #AARRGGBB here. You can also click the gear icon to add special effects to the color like chroma
darkkore.optiontype.info.optionsection: Click configure to see a list of options
darkkore.option.info.soundtype: How UI buttons sound in DarkKore menus (aka this one)
darkkore.option.info.opengui: The hotkey to &6open this config screen&r
darkkore.option.info.scrollscale:
The coefficient to which a &6scroll input is multiplied to&r
Equivalent to the &6Scroll Sensitivity&r option in Vanilla Minecraft
darkkore.option.info.changevanillaoption: Makes it so that &6Minecraft's buttons&r use &6DarkKore's&r sound effects
darkkore.option.info.hovercolor: The hover color for options in DarkKore menus
darkkore.option.info.screenbackgroundcol: The background color for DarkKore configuration screens
darkkore.option.hotkey.info.blocking: Whether activating this hotkey prevents &6other inputs from being accepted&r
darkkore.option.hotkey.info.exclusive: Whether &6other keypresses are accepted&r when activating this hotkey
darkkore.option.hotkey.info.ordered: Whether or not &6the order in which you press the keys&r matters when activating this hotkey
darkkore.option.hotkey.info.ingame: The &6game context&r to which this hotkey can be pressed
darkkore.option.hotkey.ingame.info.ingam: The hotkey can only be activated &6in-game&r
darkkore.option.hotkey.ingame.info.outga: The hotkey can only be activated &6out of game&r
darkkore.option.hotkey.ingame.info.both: The hotkey can be activated both &6in-game and out of game&r
darkkore.option.hotkey.info.ingui: The &6 GUI Context&r to which this hotkey can be pressed
darkkore.option.hotkey.ingui.info.ingui: The hotkey can be only be activated when &6in menus (GUI)&r
darkkore.option.hotkey.ingui.info.notgui: The hotkey can be only be activated when &6out of menus (GUI)&r
darkkore.option.hotkey.ingui.info.both: The hotkey can be activated in &6both contexts
darkkore.option.hotkey.info.server:
The &6RegEx String&r used to apply this keybind to &6specific servers&r
  &7&oUse &fsingleplayer&7 if you want this keybind to be specific to singleplayer
  &7&oLeave blank for this keybind to be available across all servers
darkkore.option.hotkey.info.gamemode:
The &6gamemode&r that this keybind will work in, in the form of the &6legacy numerical gamemodes&r
  &7&oSet to -1 for the keybind to work in all gamemodes
darkkore.option.color.chroma.info.active: If active this color renders as chroma. The specified color outside this menu will have no effect
darkkore.option.color.chroma.info.opacit: The opacity of the chroma. 1 is completely opaque, 0 is transparent
darkkore.option.color.chroma.info.size: The size of the bands of chroma. A higher value will have a higher band of color
darkkore.option.color.chroma.info.speed: The speed of the bands of chroma
darkkore.option.color.chroma.info.satura: The saturation of the colors. 0 is grayscale, 1 is fully saturated
